description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Pumpkin Chop 2 brings high quality pumpkin carving simulation to your xbox 360.  With the simple freehand tools, you can carve whatever you want, even if it breaks the natural laws of the universe, then showoff how awesome you are in three Animated 3D Showoff Scenes.
description.short: Pumpkin Chop 2 brings high quality pumpkin carving simulation to your xbox 360.  With the simple freehand tools, you can carve whatever you want, even if it breaks the natural laws of the universe, then showoff how awesome you are in three Animated 3D Showoff Scenes.
